wikipedia_page.main: Michael Bernard Nicholas FRCO, FRSCM (born 1938) is a British organist, conductor and composer, who was organist and master of choristers at Norwich Cathedral from 1971 to 1994 before becoming Chief Executive of the Royal College of Organists.

response: *Michael Nicholas 1964 – 1971Norwich Cathedral: church, city, and diocese, 1096–1996. Ian Atherton
